channel.title: less is mohr
channel.description: Recent content on less is mohr

item.title: just the right bits
item.description: software is beautiful when it’s simple. we know technology. your next thing deserves it. batteries included but exchangeable.

item.title: less is mohr
item.description: people with strong opinions about software and development processes. run by daniel mohr. contact us.

item.title: shift left now
item.description: it must be simple to run what you built or you won’t do it. we understand why your dev teams struggle with devops. working with large scale software engineering organisations has shown us what you really need to shift operations and security to the left.

item.title: you won't need more
item.description: keep it simple. but automate everything. minimalism is not about enforced reduction. it’s about understanding what you really need. and some things are just not negiotiable (like automation). we understand your requirements and don’t waste your money with unnecessary tech.
